page.title: 09A typical School Day - 2
page.content: {11.00}Time used doing Art, Project, Drama, Patterns and English. At the moment studying Bugs and Insects as the Project Subject. {12.10}Lunchtime. Eat in the Hall and then into the Playground with friends. May bring Sandwiches if so wish. {13.15}Games. A choice from tennis, cricket, rounders, football, netball, hockey, or swimming during the summer in their own heated swimming pool. {14.20}The last breaktime of the Day. {14.45}Might continue Project and then join in in the reading of "Toad of Toad Hall" and then finish any unfinished work. {15.45}School Ends.
